name: School Simulator
description:
School Simulator is a singleplayer 3D simulation game where you are playing as a school director. You can build your own school, hire or fire personnel, create lesson schedule and much more!

Controls
  • WASD + Mouse - Movement
  • B - Build mode
  • Q/E - Rotate objects in build mode
  • Z - Toggle snapping in build mode
  • ESC - Show/Hide tablet | Cancel building in build mode
  • ALT + F4 - Exit game (for now) :)
How to play

First you must to create a new map. Choose world size, number of trees and how much grass you want. Then click CRETE NEW WORLD!

Then you should build a foundations with stairs, so bouilders could go to build a floor.

Next press ESC and hire some builders and wait fot them to arrive. When floor is complete, start building walls, then you can place some furnitures inside.

Now it's great time to setup lesson schedule. You can do that by clicking on the director's desk. To create new lesson you need to have:

  • Classroom with:
    • Whiteboard
    • Teacher desk
    • 2x School chair
    • School desk
  • Teacher
Installation
  1. Download game
  2. Unzip it
  3. Play!

This game is in pre-alpha state so... be careful when playing. There might be some bugs.
